comment:
* Information about a single text correction that an editor has reported to
 * an input method.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public int getOffset()
methods.comment:
* Return the offset position of this correction in the text. Both the {@link #getOldText()} and
     * {@link #getNewText()} start at this offset.

methods.name: public CharSequence getOldText()
methods.comment: * Return the text that has actually been typed by the user, and which has been corrected.

methods.name: public CharSequence getNewText()
methods.comment: * Return the new text that corrects what was typed by the user.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     *
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
